properties.entry: SELECT T.ID,CONCAT(belongto_sys_name,CONCAT(T.NAME,T.TEMPNAME)) NAME FROM (SELECT SR.ID, (CASE belongto_sys_id WHEN 1 THEN '客服中心-' WHEN 2 THEN '呼叫中心-' ELSE '客服中心-' END) AS belongto_sys_name, CASE SR.TYPE WHEN 2 THEN '【混合角色】' WHEN 1 THEN '【流程角色】' ELSE '【功能角色】' END AS TEMPNAME, SR.NAME,sr.belongto_sys_id FROM SEC_ROLE SR WHERE SR.ID NOT IN ( SELECT SU.ROLE_ID FROM SEC_USER_ROLE SU WHERE 1=1 {? AND SU.USER_ID = #userId#} )) T WHERE 1 = 1 {? AND T.NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#name#),'%') ESCAPE '/'} ORDER BY T.NAME LIMIT 200
SELECT count(1) from sec_user t where 1 = 1 and t.STATUS = 'enabled' and t.MOBILE_PHONE = #mobilePhone# {?and t.ID != #id#}
